title: Food and Recipes
description: This app helps the user to enter the ingredient and list of the food item. The user can see the recipes of their choice.

title: Expenses Tracker
description: This app helps the user to enter their expenses. The user can track their expenses.

title: Outdoor Antics
description: This app helps the user to enter their expenses. The user can track their expenses.

title: Rock Paper Scissors
description: This is the simple rock paper scissor game built in Java. The user get to choose from Rock, Paper and Scissor and a winner is decided in comparison with the random choice created.

title: Todo App
description: Simple todo app build in Java. The writer will be able to add the task to the file. The writer will be able to view the task in the list stored in a file.
